title: Negative Positive Angler
overview: Tsunehiro's life isn't easy. After a doctor gives him two years to live and debt collectors come knocking, he falls from a bridge. In the knick of time, Hana and her crew spot Tsunehiro and pull him to safety. Before returning, they anchor offshore to fish and Tsunehiro catches a huge sea bass in a bout of beginner's luck. As his apartment building crumbles, Tsunehiro's new life begins to unfold!
